short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add feed to Slack's RSS integration by Action.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension, when you press Page Action on a web page that can detect RSS feeds, you can open the Slack's RSS integration page with the RSS feed URL embedded.
